name: portainer-compose
description: My docker compose files for my home server
author: Paul DiLoreto <paul.diloreto@gmail.com>

scripts.update-network: yarn network-compose down && yarn network-compose pull && yarn network-compose up -d
scripts.update-media: yarn media-compose down && yarn media-compose pull && yarn media-compose up -d
scripts.update-backup: yarn backup-compose down && yarn backup-compose pull && yarn backup-compose up -d
scripts.update-hass: yarn hass-compose down && yarn hass-compose pull && yarn hass-compose up -d
scripts.update-all: yarn update-network && yarn update-media && yarn update-hass && yarn update-backup
scripts.restart-all: yarn network-compose down && yarn media-compose down && yarn backup-compose down && yarn hass-compose down && yarn network-compose up -d && yarn media-compose up -d && yarn backup-compose up -d && yarn hass-compose up -d
